# simple-json-yaml-toml-converter
## Description
Simple json/yaml/toml converter.

## How to use
```
Usage: simple-json-yaml-toml-converter [OPTIONS] [INPUT_FILES]...

Options:
  -o, --output-format TEXT
  --debug / --no-debug
  -e, --encoding TEXT
  --help                    Show this message and exit.
```
